channel.title: I need help making a server
channel.description: I just got silver village source and I need help on how to get it started up. After I edit it of course.

item.title: I need help making a server
item.dc:creator: @JBJr JBJr
item.description:
@JBJr wrote:

Do you mean how to get it online?
Well if you do, this is how.

You would either get a no-ip, or hamachi.
I dont know how to get a no-ip (really wish i did :/) so I’ll tell you how to get Hamachi.

Go to this link: www.hamachi.cc/download/list.php

Download the English Version
Go through the step by step that Hamachi gives you to learn about it.
To find the IP of your server, look at the top of your Hamachi window. There will be a series of numbers. That will be your server’s IP.

Make a network call it whatever you want, and make a password (make the password something easy to remember like 123 so people can join your network and get into your server easily)

There is how you can get your server online with a Hamachi.
I’m sorry I don’t know no-ip.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help making a server
